item.title: ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Soundtrack Adds Third Top 10 Hit on Songs Chart
item.description: Three songs from Netflix’s “KPop Demon Hunters” soundtrack are in the top 10 of Billboard’s Hot 100 songs chart for the first time. Climbing to No. 10 from it’s previous

item.title: Morgan Wallen’s ‘I’m the Problem’ Returns to No. 1; ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Gains Ground at No. 2
item.description: Morgan Wallen’s “I’m the Problem” is back at No. 1 on the Billboard 200 chart, earning a ninth nonconsecutive week in the lead. After several new releases from Travis Scott, Justin Bieber

item.title: ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Soundtrack Hits New Peak of No. 2 on Albums Chart
item.description: Netflix and Sony Pictures Animation’s “KPop Demon Hunters” soundtrack — performed by a fictional girl group called Huntrix in the animated feature — claims the No. 2 spot
